com.fujitsu.xml.xlink.processor
Interface XLinkMessageReporter

public interface XLinkMessageReporter

Message handler interface.
This reports an error/warning message issued in XLink or XPointer processing.
Method pushMessage() of this interface is called from an XLink processor.
If a message handler specific to the application is necessary, set the instance of the class with this interface installed in the XLink processor.
See setMessageReporter() for information on how to set a message handler in an XLink processor.
A message handler class with a function that outputs messages to the standard error output is set in an XLink processor as default.

Method Summary
 void pushMessage(java.lang.String message, Node position)
          A message is reported.
